summary: In Mexico, a former lawyer becomes the invaluable second-in-command to a casino owner, whose wife begins to fall for him.
cast: Paul Muni|Bette Davis|Margaret Lindsay|Eugene Pallette|Robert Barrat|Soledad Jiménez|Hobart Cavanaugh|Gavin Gordon|William B. Davidson|Arthur Stone|Vivian Tobin|Carmen Gould|Oscar Apfel|Wade Boteler|Glen Cavender|Jack Chefe|Wallis Clark|Carlos De Valdez|John Eberts|Alphonse Ethier|Eddie Graham|Samuel S. Hinds|Milton Kibbee|Eddie Lee|Chris-Pin Martin|Addie McPhail|Edward McWade|Bert Moorhouse|Edmund Mortimer|Ralph Navarro|David Newell|Marjorie North|Jack Norton|Henry O'Neill|Frank Puglia|George Regas|Julian Rivero|Mary Russell|Cliff Saum|Harry Semels|Teru Shimada|Arthur Treacher|Jack Trent|Carlos Villarías|Arthur Vinton|Jack Wise
director: Director: Archie Mayo (as Archie L. Mayo)
title: Barreras infranqueables
